name: skugo
description: Generate a unique shareable link and remote into a machine via web interface (SSH)

scripts.build-client: cd client && npm install --no-progress && eslint src/* && rm -rf ./bin && webpack --mode production
scripts.build-host: cd host && npm install --no-progress && eslint src/* && tsc
scripts.build-relay: cd relay && npm install --no-progress && eslint src/* && tsc
scripts.deploy-relay: npm run build-relay && cd relay && openode deploy
scripts.build-all: npm run build-client && npm run build-host && npm run build-relay

author: Trevor Sundberg
